document.full_text: cable tv pioneer john malone likes a bargain, and his $17 a share bid for barnes & noble inc is already being slammed for undervaluing the largest u.s. bookstore chain.
document.title: malone eyes nook in "cheap" barnes & noble bid
lines_and_colors: cable tv pioneer john malone likes a bargain, and his $17 a share bid for barnes & noble inc is already being slammed for undervaluing the largest u.s. bookstore chain.
